hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Adi bin Hatim that :the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), said: "Whoever swears an oath then sees that something else is better than it, let him do that which is better and offer expiation for what he swore about

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ حَلَفَ عَلَى يَمِينٍ فَرَأَى غَيْرَهَا خَيْرًا مِنْهَا
chapter.eng-name: One who swears an oath and then sees that something else is better
